scripts.run_xf_oneObj_alloc: yarn run_ xf transform oneObj arrVec default && yarn run_ xf transform oneObj arrArr default && yarn run_ xf transform oneObj bufArr default && yarn run_ xf transform oneObj bufF64 default
scripts.run_xf_oneArr_alloc: yarn run_ xf transform oneArr arrVec default && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr arrArr default && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr bufArr default && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr bufF64 default
scripts.run_xf_oneObj_push: yarn run_ xf transform oneObj arrVec force   && yarn run_ xf transform oneObj arrArr force   && yarn run_ xf transform oneObj bufArr force   && yarn run_ xf transform oneObj bufF64 force
scripts.run_xf_oneArr_push: yarn run_ xf transform oneArr arrVec force   && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr arrArr force   && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr bufArr force   && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr bufF64 force
scripts.bench-all-xf: yarn build && yarn run_xf_oneObj_push && yarn run_xf_oneArr_push && yarn run_xf_oneObj_alloc && yarn run_xf_oneArr_alloc

scripts.make-log-opt: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --allow-natives-syntax --trace-opt --log-deopt --no-logfile-per-isolate --logfile=v8log/v8.log tsc-out/esnext/index.js 2>NUL
scripts.make-log-ic: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --allow-natives-syntax --log-ic --log-maps     --no-logfile-per-isolate --logfile=v8log/v8.log tsc-out/esnext/index.js 2>NUL
scripts.j_: yarn run_ xf transform oneObj bufF64 default && yarn run_ xf transform oneArr bufF64 force && yarn run_ xf transform oneF64 bufF64
